Package com.linecorp.armeria.client.endpoint.healthcheck

Class HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.client.endpoint.healthcheck.HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder
  • public class HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder
extends Object
    A builder for creating new HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroups.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder​(EndpointGroup delegate, String healthCheckPath)
      Creates a new HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroup build()
      Returns a newly created HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroup based on the contents of the HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder.
      HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder clientFactory​(ClientFactory clientFactory)
      Sets the ClientFactory to use when making health check requests.
      HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder healthCheckPort​(int healthCheckPort)
      Sets the port where a health check request will be sent instead of the original port number specified by EndpointGroup's Endpoints.
      HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder protocol​(SessionProtocol protocol)
      Sets the SessionProtocol to be used when making health check requests.
      HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder retryInterval​(Duration retryInterval)
      Sets the interval between health check requests.
      HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder withClientOptions​(Function<? super ClientOptionsBuilder,ClientOptionsBuilder> configurator)
      Sets the Function that customizes an HttpClient for health check.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder

        public HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder​(EndpointGroup delegate,
                                             String healthCheckPath)
        Creates a new HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder. Health check requests for the delegate EndpointGroup will be made against healthCheckPath.

    • Method Detail

      • healthCheckPort

        public HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder healthCheckPort​(int healthCheckPort)
        Sets the port where a health check request will be sent instead of the original port number specified by EndpointGroup's Endpoints. This property is useful when your server listens to health check requests on a different port.

      • protocol

        public HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder protocol​(SessionProtocol protocol)
        Sets the SessionProtocol to be used when making health check requests.

      • retryInterval

        public HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder retryInterval​(Duration retryInterval)
        Sets the interval between health check requests. Must be positive.

      • clientFactory

        public HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder clientFactory​(ClientFactory clientFactory)
        Sets the ClientFactory to use when making health check requests. This should generally be the same as the ClientFactory used when creating a Client stub using the EndpointGroup.

      • withClientOptions

        public HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder withClientOptions​(Function<? super ClientOptionsBuilder,ClientOptionsBuilder> configurator)
        Sets the Function that customizes an HttpClient for health check. 
        
 new HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder(delegate, healthCheckPath)
     .withClientOptions(op -> op.defaultResponseTimeout(Duration.ofSeconds(1)))
     .build();

      • build

        public HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroup build()
        Returns a newly created HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroup based on the contents of the HttpHealthCheckedEndpointGroupBuilder.
